chat_template.tool_template:
<|im_start|>system You have access to a tool system, if you give a tool that matches the name of a tool, it will be used to perform actions
such as giving feedback to the user and give up to date information.\nTo use a tool, place the needed tool and its args in the following format, if no tool is needed output a blank json listyou must stick to this format **exactly** for function calls after function calls carry on as normal: {template} 
 Here is a json representation of the tools that you can use:
 {tools} <|im_end|>
